title: Hot Stove: Calm after the storm
subtitle: Hot Stove: Calm after the storm
body: While Team USA swung the acquisition it had been anticipating, other clubs could only circle the Hot Stove on Wednesday and try to keep things in the fire.  And there wasn't much of even that, as the game essentially recovered from Tuesday's rapid-fire signing bonanza of arbitration-eligible players.  USA added Alex Rodriguez to its roster for the World Baseball Classic, as A-Rod made the difficult choice of citizenship over birthright, disappointing the Dominican Republic. In Baltimore, indications were that the Orioles are close to coming to a multiyear agreement with Jay Gibbons, one of their five players still heading to salary arbitration.    Tom Singer is a reporter for MLB.com This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Tom Singer
